data.name: The Neroe
data.detailed_description:
Neroe decides to embark on an adventure. At the same time, evil is close to end the world. To stop it, Neroe will fight against dangerous enemies and obtain the keys to access the Castle where he will face the final boss.

The challenges of the OVERWORLD and the dangers of the DUNGEONS

Neroe will go into forests, mountains or deserts to find the dungeons, surely you will recognize them as soon as you see them.
Inside this dungeons, Neroe will face very dangerous enemies. Be careful, Neroe only have one life. To avoid his end, find the treasure and the shop and collect items, like weapons. They will be useful at the end of the dungeon!

Collect EQUIPMENT to make you powerful

During Neroe's adventure he will find mysterious items. You will find them as treasures in the dungeons, but they will also be hidden in secret caves. Neroe will also meet people who will sell rare items. As Neroe obtains items, you will see how they synergize!

Catch the CREATURES

In the overworld, Neroe will find many different creatures to catch. You can attack with them but also they will provide you with very useful abilities. When you go to catch them, many will defend themselves against you and others will attack Neroe on sight, so be careful!

Playing with a friend on LOCAL MULTIPLAYER

You can play solo but you can also play in local multiplayer with a friend. The player one will be Neroe and the player two will be Redos. You can cooperate or fight among yourselves. The screen will split and each player makes his own adventure!

Neroe can meet people

There are people in the villages but also hidden in caves, talk to all of them so you don't miss any detail!

Achievements and secrets

Some things will be locked when you start a save file but as you play and complete the quests, you will unlock them. Unlock them all!

Content

  • +100 capturable creatures!
  • +150 items, some of them equipable, some of them for use!
  • +50 enemies
  • +35 bosses
  • +5 dungeons
  • 5 villages
  • +500 dungeon rooms
  • +1500 overworld rooms
  • Secrets that you will have to find out

data.short_description: Action-adventure roguelike game in which you can catch and control creatures. Explore the open world, find the secrets, get items and complete the dungeons. Play solo or local multiplayer: each player makes his own adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Widescreen not tested.
